text: Peter Mullan (; born 2 November 1959) is a Scottish actor and director. He is best known for his role in Ken Loach's My Name Is Joe (1998) and The Claim (2000). Mullan appeared in cult classics such as Riff-Raff (1991), Braveheart (1995), Trainspotting (1996), Young Adam (2003), Children of Men (2006), War Horse (2011) and the Harry Potter series (2010–11)."Peter Mullan Biography (1960–)" Yahoo.com (Retrieved: 15 August 2009)"Biography: Peter Mullan", FilmReference.com (Retrieved: 15 August 2009) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Movie directors Category:Aberdeenshire
title: Peter Mullan
